prompt: A full art image of a Mystical Beast from the theme of Mystic Swamp. This is an uncommon card featuring the Glowing Fey Dragon, a mesmerizing creature with bioluminescent scales that light up the surrounding swamp. The dragon is perched on an ancient tree, with mist swirling around it and glowing plants illuminating the scene. The background showcases ancient trees and hidden secrets beneath the murky waters with mystical symbols intertwined in the misty air. The artwork is dark yet vibrant, capturing the eerie beauty and magical nature of the swamp.
